version_description:
● Native Support: Works flawlessly with nanoKEY Studio and nanoKONTROL Studio
● Kamata: Video game sound gadget developed in collaboration with BANDAI NAMCO Studios (in-app purchase possible)
● Gladstone: Rich acoustic drum gadget that allows you to control the ambience exactly as you like (In-app purchase possible)
● Madrid: Bass gadget that creates real and dynamic sounds and includes 6 different amps (in-app purchase possible)
● Better Effects: Added 8 new effects. Insert FX increased to 5 (maximum)
● Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use

● Fixed “Duplicate” function.
● Other minor bug fixes and improvements.
● Bug fixes and improvements.
● Bug fixes and improvements.
● Bug fixes and improvements.
● Bug fixes and improvements.
• Added MIDI import (SMF format) function.

• Lexington：The legendary analog synthesiser, "ARP ODYSSEY gadget".
• Native Support: Works flawlessly with nanoKEY Studio (Lexington gadget).
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use. * This version requires iOS 9.3 or later.

- Milpitas : iWAVESTATION Gadget. Milpitas is available by buying our brand new iWAVESTATION app.
- Fixed several minor bugs including Audio Copy issues.
Bug fixes and improvements.

• Two new gadgets provide long-awaited audio recording.
• “Recife” - A new powerful drum gadget with 16 pads.
• Supports music sharing service "Allihoopa". http://allihoopa.com/
• Supports exporting plug-in data with Ableton Live Export.
• Supports audio document manager “AudioShare”.
• Other improvements have been made to enhance stability.

• Improved the behavior when connecting Bluetooth Audio.
• Other improvements have been made to enhance stability.

• Supports importing Projects from Gadget Le.
• Improves performance when connecting with Dropbox.
• Other improvements have been made to enhance stability.

• Added the new preset sounds "Factory 2" to nine gadgets.
• Various other adjustments to improve stability and ease of use.

• Montpellier：The iconic 4VCO synthesizer, “KORG iMono/Poly“ is now a gadget.
• Improved so that note input during pre-count is kept.
• Improved so that the count-in sounds even when the metronome is OFF.
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.
• Improvements have been made to enhance stability.

• Bug fix.
• Improvements have been made to enhance stability.

• Lisbon : A polyphonic synthesizer gadget to create the sound of the future.
• Vancouver : A simple sampler gadget that allows you to play preloaded sounds using the keyboard.
• DeeMax : Loudness Maximizer “DOTEC-AUDIO DeeMax” is now a gadget.
• Supported iPhone X.
• Project uploading and browsing for Allihoopa.
• Added import and export of user programs.
• Fixed the problem of the IFX knob being difficult to use.
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.

• Fixed crash issues when using Vancouver on 32bit devices.
• Fixed crash when inserting multiple Lisbon.
• Fixed an issue where Lisbon's Chord Pad would not work properly.
• Fixed an issue where Lexington's skin (Rev1/Rev2) does not switch.
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.

• Improved overall performance.
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.

• Supported new Expansion Sound Libraries of KORG Module.
• Improved overall performance.
• Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.
• Fixed an issue with gadgets from KORG Module Standard for iPhone being inaccessible even when the app is installed.

・Stockholm by Reason : Stockholm by Reason is a gadgetized version of the Dr. Octo Rex Loop Player.
・MIDI External Sync behavior has been improved.
・Vancouver gadget SPACE FX APOLLO has been improved.
・Fixed an issue that crashes when iCloud Drive files are deleted.
・Other enhancements to make Gadget easier to use.

* Purchased as in-app content
・Fixed a crash issue and improved stability in Stockholm.

• Added ability to receive song data from KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch with a QR code.
• Files App support.
• Stability improvements and bug fixes.

Stockholm:
• Slice lock mode : long press the “slice trigger” button on the performance page to prevent the slice assign popover from opening while using the pads. The button will begin blinking to indicate that this mode is active. Long press again to exit this mode.
• Loop latch mode : long press the “loop trigger” button on the performance page to make Stockholm continue to play loops after the note trigger has ended. Long press again to exit this mode.
• File load speedup.

・Supported a new Expansion Sound Library "SYNTHOGY - Ivory Mobile American D" from KORG Module.
・Bug fixes and improvements.

・Now supports New iPad Pro.
・Other improvements and bug-fixes.

· Now supports “Organ & Clav Collection” of KORG Module.
· Improved the standard MIDI file import function.
· Now supports the transport control in the full screen view mode. (excluding iPhone 4s)
· Allihoopa service is no longer supported*.
* Allihoopa service will be closed on January 17, 2019. For more details (https://allihoopa.com/info). You can back up your project files by using “Mixtape”.
· Other improvements and bug-fixes.

・Version 2 is now the largest gadget instrument collection to date.
・New design with a new color scheme. Intuitive user interface.
・Basic performance expanded. Tempo change and fade in/fade out supported.
・The newly added Taipei gadget allows you to connect to various MIDI devices.
・Four new IFX have been added, including feedback reverb, exciter, enhancer and saturator.

* Project files made with KORG Gadget 2 are not compatible with KORG Gadget 1, so please be careful.

- Fixed a problem uploading in a format that can not be played with GadgetCloud.
- Fixed a bug with the modulation wheel in Memphis.
- Fixed an issue where Saturator might not work properly.
- Fixed a problem where Darwin's pitch bend does not work.
- Fixed an issue where some samples could not be read on Gladstone.
- Fixed a problem with tempo inaccuracy in Stockholm.
- Improved some of the UI for easy viewing.
- Other improvements and bug-fixes.

- Bug fix
- Other stability improvements

- Fixed a bug causing unexpected drops in volume under certain conditions.
- Fixed a bug that causes a crash when importing a QR code from the Switch version.

• Changed the background color of the sequencer to make it easier to see.
• Supported vertical scaling in the piano roll.
• “Select All” and Octave shift commands are added in the sequencer: Much easier to handle the MIDI events.
• Gadget 2 app are now able to export the project file in the version 1 format. So you can continue to work in the Gadget 1 for Mac version. Please update your Gadget 1 for Mac to the latest version (v1.7.4) to use this feature.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

• Improves “Note Event Edit” view
• Taipei gadget can be switched to another synth gadget
• Unwanted parameters no longer sent from Taipei when you change its programs.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

• Improved the behavior of the sample browser.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

1. The projects containing user samples stored in iCloud were unable to be opened properly. This has been fixed.
2. Improved performance of the sample browser in Bilbao, Abu Dhabi, and Vancouver gadgets
3. Added search function to the new sample browser

1. "Module Performance Expansion" sound set is supported in Glasgow gadget.
2. The projects containing user rx2 files stored in iCloud were unable to be opened properly. This has been fixed.
3. The sound browser in Stockholm gadget is updated.
Unable to load mp3/aac/m4a samples in Sampler gadgets such as Vancouver/Bilbao/Abu Dhabi. This has been fixed.
- The integration with KORG Module was failed in some situations. This has been fixed.

• Added "Otorii" gadget that collaborated with SEGA*.
• Added "Ebina" gadget that collaborated with TAITO*.
• Added "Warszawa" gadget, work with ELECTRIBE Wave.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

* In-App Purchase content.
- Otorii UI does not appear in some cases. This has been fixed.

• Now supports iOS13.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

• Fixed an issue with some gadgets’ keyboards not displaying properly on iOS13.
• Other improvements and bug-fixes.

- KApro's Monumental Choir can be used in Gadget if you get it at KORG Module.
- Stability improvements.

Bug fixes
- When you import audio/samples in Zurich, Durban, Rosario, Bilbao, Abu Dhabi, Vancouver and Stockholm, the app might crash. This has been fixed.
- Even if you have Module Standard, you could not use their sounds on Gadget. This has been fixed.
- Monumental Choir Dreams programs on Gadget did not sound same as on Module. This has been fixed.

- A new synth from Module/Module Pro called Fairbanks. This synth can be unlocked if you have Module series.
- The Glasgow Browser has been updated. This category-based browser makes it easier and faster to find what you want.
- Starting with this version, you can unlock some of the KORG Module's features. For example, 6 Module-based instruments are available in Gadget. Please try their pro-grade keyboard sounds - KORG Module app is free. https://support.korguser.net/hc/ja/articles/360030601932
- iOS compatibility changed: This version needs iOS 11 or upper.
Updated the mod wheel assets in the Fairbanks.

[Bugfix]
- Sound programs sometimes did not appear correctly in the Glasgow browser. This has been fixed.

[bugfix]
- You could not change any sounds in the gadget such as London, Amsterdam on iOS14. This has been fixed.
[Module x Gadget integration] You can use Lo-Fi house sound via Fairbanks gadget once you get it through KORG Module or Module Pro apps.
- KORG Module offers a new expansion pack "80s Dance Pop" from version 4.1.1. If you get it, you can also use that sound pack in Gadget through the Fairbanks!

[Bug fix] The sound of the Polysix ensemble effect was undesirably changed in the version 4.6.5. This has been fixed.
[Bug fix] Audio input was unusable in some environments. This has been fixed.
[Enhancement] The sound browser in the Fairbanks gadget is now a category-based one.
- Several bug fixes to improve the app stability
Once the “Far North” sound pack is purchased in KORG Module/Module Pro, the sounds can also be used in the Fairbanks gadget.

- Once the "Synth Drum" sound pack is purchased in KORG Module/Module Pro, the sounds can also be used in the Fairbanks gadget.
- Improved the app stability
- Once the "Neo Soul" sound pack is purchased in KORG Module/Module Pro, the sounds can also be used in the Fairbanks gadget.
- Once the "Melodic Techno" sound pack is purchased in KORG Module/Module Pro, the sounds can also be used in the Fairbanks gadget.

Fixed GadgetCloud functionality
- You can now listen to the tracks in the lists again.
- Your track will be now listed after being uploaded to GadgetCloud.
